st:Description.name: CATTPSEditor
st:Description.st:role: Manages Functional Tolerancing and Annotation options

st:attribute.Name: standard
st:attribute.st:role: Default standard at creation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Sets default standard at creation.

st:attribute.Name: CATFTAUFAutoTolerancingSetting
st:attribute.st:role: File name and path to the tolerancing schema catalog that has to be used for the automatic tolerancing of User Features
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: File name and path to the tolerancing schema catalog that has to be used for the automatic tolerancing of User Features.

st:attribute.Name: NonSemanticAllwaysUpgrade
st:attribute.st:role: Always try to create semantic tolerances and dimensions
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: When a non-semantic tolerance or dimension is created, an attempt to transform it in a semantic one is always done.

st:attribute.Name: TPSUpgradeGeneralTol
st:attribute.st:role: Always try to create semantic general tolerances on dimensions
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: When a non-semantic dimension is created, an attempt to transform it in a semantic one is always done.

st:attribute.Name: NonSemanticTolAllowed
st:attribute.st:role: Non-semantic tolerance creation allowed
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Allows or not the creation of non-semantic tolerances.

st:attribute.Name: NonSemanticDimAllowed
st:attribute.st:role: Non-semantic dimension creation allowed
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Allows or not the creation of non-semantic dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: LeaderAssociativity
st:attribute.st:role: Leader associativity to the geometry
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines associativity to the geometry for leader of 3D annotations at creation.

st:enum.st:detailedRole: Allows leader extremity to move freely on the geometry.
Makes leader perpendicular to the geometry.

st:attribute.Name: PUBLISHED_GEOMETRY
st:attribute.st:role: Create annotation on published geometry only
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Creates annotation on published geometry only.

st:attribute.Name: NoaCreation
st:attribute.st:role: Allow note object attribute creation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Allows user to create note object attribute.

st:attribute.Name: NonSemanticMarked
st:attribute.st:role: Mark non-semantic annotations
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Marks with wavy red line non-semantic 3D annotations of the types: Datum, Datum Target, Geometrical Tolerance and Dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_GRIDDISPLAY_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Display the grid
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines that you will display the grid.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_GRIDSNAPT_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Snap to point
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Helps you creating points at given locations.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_AllowDistortions_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Allow distortions in the grid
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Allows different graduations and spacing in the grid.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_GridPrimarySpacing_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Main grid spacing in horizontal direction
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the main spacing to be applied to the grid in the horizontal direction.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_GridSecondaryStep_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Number of graduations in horizontal direction
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Applies a given number of graduations to each primary spacing in the horizontal direction.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_GridVPrimarySpacing_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Main grid spacing in vertical direction
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the main spacing to be applied to the grid in the vertical direction.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_GridVSecondaryStep_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Number of graduations in vertical direction
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Applies a given number of graduations to each primary spacing in the vertical direction.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_NODE_UNDERFEAT_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Annotations under geometric feature nodes
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Specifies whether annotations are displayed under the geometric feature nodes in the specification tree.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_NODE_ANNOTUNDERVIEW_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Annotations under view/annotation plane nodes
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Specifies whether annotations are displayed under the view/annotation plane nodes in the specification tree.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_NODE_ANNOTUNDERSET_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Annoations under annotation set node
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Specifies whether annotations are displayed under the annotation set node in the specification tree.

st:attribute.Name: SaveInCGR
st:attribute.st:role: Save 3D Annotation representation in cache
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Save in cache\nSave 3D Annotation representation in cache.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_RESTRICTED_AREA_CHECK_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Apply restricted area settings while creating
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines whether the following settings are applied while creating a restricted area feature.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_RESTRICTED_AREA_COLOR1_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Red constituent of restricted area surface color
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Red constituent of the surface color of the restricted area.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_RESTRICTED_AREA_COLOR2_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Green constituent of restricted area surface color
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Green constituent of the surface color of the restricted area.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_RESTRICTED_AREA_COLOR3_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Blue constituent of restricted area surface color
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Blue constituent of the surface color of the restricted area.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_RESTRICTED_AREA_TRANS_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Restricted area transparency
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the surface color transparency of the restricted area.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_RESTRICTED_LINE_TYPE_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Restricted area edge type
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the edge type of the restricted area's border.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_RESTRICTED_THICKNESS_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Restricted area edge thickness
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the edge thickness of the restricted area's border.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_RESTRICTED_AREA_COLORL1_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Red constituent of restricted area edge color
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Red constituent of the edge color of the restricted area's border.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_RESTRICTED_AREA_COLORL2_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Green constituent of restricted area edge color
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Green constituent of the edge color of the restricted area's border.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_RESTRICTED_AREA_COLORL3_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Blue constituent of restricted area edge color
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Blue constituent of the edge color of the restricted area's border.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_NODE_PARAMETERS_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Display parameters under annotation feature node
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays annotation parameters under the annotation feature node.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_TPS_GSM_NORMALSHIFTED_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Display for shifted profile tolerance
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the display option for shifted profile tolerance.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_HIGHLIGHT_DEF_ANNOT_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Allow query for default annotation (automatic selection mode)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Allows query for default annotation (automatic selection mode).

st:attribute.Name: TPSPATTERNSECT
st:attribute.st:role: Display pattern for clipping plane
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays hatching, coloring or dotting for clipping plane in the 3D viewer.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_ALPHABETIC_ORDER_CHECK_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Display views and captures in alphabetic order
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays Views and captures in alphabetical order.

st:attribute.Name: CATTPSMirrorAnnotSet
st:attribute.st:role: Mirror annotations
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Restore readability of annotations when displaying capture.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_GRAPHIC_PROP_CHECK_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Apply graphic properties settings while creating constructed geometry
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines whether all the graphic properties settings are applied or not.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_GRAPHIC_PROP_COLOR1_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Red constituent of constructed geometry surface color
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Red constituent of the constructed geometry surface color for plane and cylinder.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_GRAPHIC_PROP_COLOR2_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Green constituent of constructed geometry surface color
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Green constituent of the constructed geometry surface color for plane and cylinder.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_GRAPHIC_PROP_COLOR3_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Blue constituent of constructed geometry surface color
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Blue constituent of the constructed geometry surface color for plane and cylinder.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_GRAPHIC_PROP_TRANS_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Constructed geometry transparency
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the surface color transparency of the constructed geometry.

st:attribute.Name: CATFTAEdgesColorSetting
st:attribute.st:role: Constructed geometry edge color
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the constructed geometry edge color.

st:attribute.Name: CATFTAEdgesLineTypeSetting
st:attribute.st:role: Constructed geometry edge type
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the constructed geometry edge type.

st:attribute.Name: CATFTAEdgesThicknessSetting
st:attribute.st:role: Constructed geometry edge thickness
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the constructed geometry edge thickness.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_GRAPHIC_PROP_COLORL1_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Red constituent of constructed geometry curve color
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Red constituent of the constructed geometry curve color.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_GRAPHIC_PROP_COLORL2_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Green constituent of constructed geometry curve color
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Green constituent of the constructed geometry curve color.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_GRAPHIC_PROP_COLORL3_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Blue constituent of constructed geometry curve color
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Blue constituent of the constructed geometry curve color.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_GRAPHIC_PROP_TYPE_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Constructed geometry curve type
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the constructed geometry curve type.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_GRAPHIC_PROP_THICKNESS_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Constructed geometry curve thickness
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the constructed geometry curve thickness.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_GRAPHIC_PROP_COLORP1_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Red constituent of constructed geometry point color
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Red constructed geometry point color.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_GRAPHIC_PROP_COLORP2_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Green constituent of constructed geometry point color
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Green constituent of the constructed geometry point color.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_GRAPHIC_PROP_COLORP3_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Blue constituent of constructed geometry point color
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Blue constituent of the constructed geometry point color.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_GRAPHIC_PROP_TYPEP_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Constructed geometry point type
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the constructed geometry point type.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_LIMITS_OVERRUN_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: All around overrun
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the minimal limit between the constructed geometry and its related geometry.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_AUTO_PT_CHECK_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Center point
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines whether all the center point's constructed geometry is automatically created or not, for circle center, sphere center.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_AUTO_LINE_CHECK_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Center axis
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines whether all the center axis's constructed geometry is automatically created or not, for cylinder, cone.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_AUTO_PLANE_CHECK_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Center plane
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines whether all the center plane's constructed geometry is automatically created or not, for slot.

st:attribute.Name: ManipRefSize
st:attribute.st:role: Reference size for displaying manipulators
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the reference size used for displaying manipulators.

st:attribute.Name: ManipZoom
st:attribute.st:role: Manipulators zoomable or not
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines if manipulators are zoomable like geometry.

st:attribute.Name: RotSnapAngle
st:attribute.st:role: Rotation snap angle
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the snapping value used when rotating an element using the Select-Rotate command.

st:attribute.Name: RotSnapAuto
st:attribute.st:role: Automatic snapping when rotating
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Snapping automatically when rotating an element.

st:attribute.Name: ORunCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display modify overrun manipulators during creation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Modify overrun manipulators let you modify interactively the overrun of each extension line during creation.

st:attribute.Name: ORunMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display modify overrun manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Modify overrun manipulators let you modify interactively the overrun of each extension line during modification.

st:attribute.Name: BlankingCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display modify blanking manipulators during creation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Modify blanking manipulators let you modify interactively the blanking of each extension line during creation.

st:attribute.Name: BlankingMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display modify blanking manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Modify blanking manipulators let you modify interactively the blanking of each extension line during modification.

st:attribute.Name: BeforeCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display insert text before manipulators during creation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Insert text before manipulator lets you easily insert a text before a dimension main value during creation.

st:attribute.Name: BeforeMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display insert text before manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Insert text before manipulator lets you easily insert a text before a dimension main value during modification.

st:attribute.Name: AfterCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display insert text after manipulators during creation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Insert text after manipulator lets you easily insert a text after a dimension main value during creation.

st:attribute.Name: AfterMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display insert text after manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Insert text after manipulator lets you easily insert a text after a dimension main value during modification.

st:attribute.Name: MoveValueCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display move value manipulators during creation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move value manipulator lets you easily move the dimension value (and only this value) during creation.

st:attribute.Name: MoveValueMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display move value manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move value manipulator lets you easily move the dimension value (and only this value) during modification.

st:attribute.Name: MoveDimLineCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display move dimension line manipulators during creation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move dimension line manipulator lets you easily move the dimension line (and only this line) during creation.

st:attribute.Name: MoveDimLineMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display move dimension line manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move dimension line manipulator lets you easily move the dimension line (and only this line) during modification.

st:attribute.Name: Move2dPartCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display move dimension line secondary part manipulators during creation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move dimension line secondary part manipulator lets you easily move the secondary part of a dimension line (and only this part) during creation.

st:attribute.Name: Move2dPartMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display move dimension line secondary part manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move dimension line secondary part manipulator lets you easily move the secondary part of a dimension line (and only this part) during modification.

st:attribute.Name: MoveLeaderCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display move dimension leader manipulators during creation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move dimension leader manipulator lets you easily move the leader (and only this part) during creation.

st:attribute.Name: MoveLeaderMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display move dimension leader manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move dimension leader manipulator lets you easily move the leader (and only this part) during modification.

st:attribute.Name: ManipTranslationAnnotCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display stretch text manipulators during selection
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Stretch text manipulator lets you lets you stretch the text of the annotation during selection.

st:attribute.Name: ManipTranslationAnnotMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display stretch text manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Stretch text manipulator lets you stretch the text of the annotation during modification.

st:attribute.Name: ManipResizeAnnotCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display resize text manipulators during selection
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Resize text manipulator lets you resize the annotation during selection.

st:attribute.Name: ManipResizeAnnotMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display resize text manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Resize text manipulator lets you resize the annotation during modification.

st:attribute.Name: ManipMoveValueAnnotCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display slide text manipulators during selection
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Slide text manipulator lets you slide the text (only the text and not its leaders) during selection.

st:attribute.Name: ManipMoveValueAnnotMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display slide text manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Slide text manipulator lets you slide the text (only the text and not its leaders) during modification.

st:attribute.Name: ManipTranslationLeaderCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display resize leader attachment manipulators during selection
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Resize leader attachment manipulator lets you resize the leader attachment (and only the attachment) during selection.

st:attribute.Name: ManipTranslationLeaderMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display resize leader attachment text manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Resize leader attachment manipulator lets you resize the leader attachment (and only the attachment) during modification.

st:attribute.Name: ManipMoveLeaderAnchorCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display move leader anchor point manipulators during selection
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move leader anchor point manipulator lets you move the anchor point of the leader (and only the anchor point) during selection.

st:attribute.Name: ManipMoveLeaderAnchorMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display move leader anchor point manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move leader anchor point manipulator lets you move the anchor point of the leader (and only the anchor point) during modification.

st:attribute.Name: ManipMoveLeaderCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display move leader manipulators during selection
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move leader manipulator lets you move the leader extremity (and only the extremity) during selection.

st:attribute.Name: ManipMoveLeaderMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display move leader manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move leader manipulator lets you move the leader extremity (and only the extremity) during modification.

st:attribute.Name: DimSketch
st:attribute.st:role: Dimension following the cursor (CTRL toggles)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Dimension follows the mouse cursor.Pressing the "CTRL" key lets you temporarily activate or deactivate this mode.

st:attribute.Name: DimLinePosValue
st:attribute.st:role: Default dimension line/geometry distance
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the default distance between dimension line and geometry at creation and/or when moving the geometry.

st:attribute.Name: DimLinePosRelative
st:attribute.st:role: Constant offset between dimension line and geometry
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Lets the dimension line remain at a defined distance from the geometry when the geometry is moving.

st:attribute.Name: DimCircle
st:attribute.st:role: By default, create dimensions on circle's or cylinder's or revolute's center or axis or edge
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: By default, creates dimensions on circle's or cylinder's or revolute's center or axis or edge.

st:enum.st:role: Create dimensions on circle's or cylinder's or revolute's center or axis
st:enum.st:detailedRole: Creates dimensions on circle's or cylinder's or revolute's center or axis.
st:enum.st:role: Create dimensions on circle's or cylinder's or revolute's edge
st:enum.st:detailedRole: Creates dimensions on circle's or cylinder's or revolute's edge.

st:attribute.Name: ConfigurationSnapping
st:attribute.st:role: Configure snapping
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Configures the way dimension snaps its position on the grid or its value between symbols.

st:enum.st:detailedRole: Snaps the position of the dimension on the grid.
Snaps the value to its standard position if it's located between symbols.
Both snaps position on the grid and value between symbols.

st:attribute.Name: DimSnap
st:attribute.st:role: Snap by default (SHIFT toggles)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Activates snapping when moving dimensions.Use the "Configure snapping" button to customize the way the dimension snaps. Pressing the "Shift" key lets you temporarily activate or deactivate this mode.

st:attribute.Name: DimMoveSubPart
st:attribute.st:role: Move only selected sub-part
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Allows to move only the selected sub-part of the dimension(dimension line, value, or dimension line secondary).

st:attribute.Name: TPSDimLineUpOffsetToRefLength
st:attribute.st:role: Default offset to reference for length/distance/angle dimensions
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the default value for the offset to the reference, for length/distance/angle dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: TPSDimLineUpOffsetToRefAngle
st:attribute.st:role: Default offset to reference for radius/diameter dimensions
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the default value for the offset to the reference, for radius/diameter dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: TPSDimLineUpOffsetBetDimLength
st:attribute.st:role: Default offset between dimensions for length/distance/angle dimensions
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Default value for the offset between dimensions, for length/distance/angle dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: TPSDimLineUpOffsetBetDimAngle
st:attribute.st:role: Default offset between dimensions for radius/diameter dimensions
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the default value for the offset between dimensions, for radius/diameter dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: DrwLineUpStackVal
st:attribute.st:role: Align stacked dimension values
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Aligns all the values of a group of stacked dimensions on the value of the smallest dimension of the group.

st:attribute.Name: DrwLineUpCumulVal
st:attribute.st:role: Align cumulated dimension values
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Aligns all the values of a group of cumulated dimensions on the value of the smallest dimension of the group.

st:attribute.Name: DrwLineUpAutoFunnel
st:attribute.st:role: Automatically add a funnel
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Automatically adds a funnel whenever the value of the dimension cannot be displayed correctly without it.

st:attribute.Name: OrientedSymbol
st:attribute.st:role: Use dimension origin symbol
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines whether the dimension origin symbol is used.

st:attribute.Name: AnalysisDisplayMode
st:attribute.st:role: Activate analysis display mode
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays the various types of dimensions in different and customizable colors.

st:attribute.Name: TrueDim
st:attribute.st:role: Color used in analysis display mode to represent True length dimensions
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used in analysis display mode to represent True length dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: AnnotOnDelGeom
st:attribute.st:role: Dimensions and annotations on deleted geometry
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions and annotations on deleted geometry.

st:attribute.Name: AnnotOnUnloadGeom
st:attribute.st:role: Dimensions and annotations on unloaded geometry
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions and annotations on unloaded geometry.

st:attribute.Name: AnnotInvalid
st:attribute.st:role: Invalid dimensions and annotations
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used in analysis display mode to represent invalid dimensions and annotations.

st:attribute.Name: TrueDimCol
st:attribute.st:role: Color used in analysis display mode to represent True length dimensions
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used in analysis display mode to represent True length dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: AnnotOnDelGeomCol
st:attribute.st:role: Color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions and annotations on deleted geometry
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions and annotations on deleted geometry.

st:attribute.Name: AnnotOnUnloadGeomCol
st:attribute.st:role: Color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions and annotations on unloaded geometry
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions and annotations on unloaded geometry.

st:attribute.Name: AnnotInvalidCol
st:attribute.st:role: Color used in analysis display mode to represent invalid dimensions and annotations
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used in analysis display mode to represent invalid dimensions and annotations.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_ANNOT_MOVEAFTERCREATION_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Annotation following the cursor (CTRL toggles)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Annotation follows the mouse cursor.Pressing the "CTRL" key lets you temporarily activate or deactivate this mode.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_ANNOT_EXTLINELENGTH_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Define the extension line length
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the extension line length between the geometrical frame and the its leader.

st:attribute.Name: CAPTURE_BODY_HIDE_ALLOWED
st:attribute.st:role: Manage the visibility of part instances, bodies and geometrical sets
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines whether the visibility status of part instances in products, bodies and geometrical sets in parts is managed by captures or not.

st:attribute.Name: BrokenLinksAutoReconnectionSetting
st:attribute.st:role: Automatically propose reconnection of broken links
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Automatically proposes the reconnection of broken links.

st:attribute.Name: BrokenLinksAutoReconnectionModeSetting
st:attribute.st:role: Different modes available for automatic reconnection of broken links
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Different modes available for automatic reconnection of broken links.

st:attribute.Name: CATFTAUseLastTolerancesSetting
st:attribute.st:role: New Size Tolerances Creation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Options for default size tolerances values management at creation time.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_SIZE_DEFAULTUPPERANGLENUM_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Default upper tolerance value for angular size
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the default upper tolerance value for angular size.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_ANGLE_SIZE_SYM_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Symmetric lower limit for angular size
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines whether the default lower tolerance value is symmetric in relation to the default upper tolerance value or not.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_SIZE_DEFAULTLOWERANGLENUM_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Default lower tolerance value for angular size
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the default lower tolerance value for angular size, enabled when Symmetric lower limit is not selected.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_SIZE_DEFAULTNUMANGLESTEP_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Numerical value increment for angular size
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the numerical value increment for angular size .

st:attribute.Name: DIM_ANG_GENERAL_TOL_CLASS
st:attribute.st:role: General tolerance class for angular size ISO standard
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the general tolerance class for angular size, according to ISO Standard

st:attribute.Name: DIM_ANG_GENERAL_TOL_ASME_CLASS
st:attribute.st:role: General tolerance class for angular size ASME standard
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the general tolerance class for angular size, according to ASME Standard

st:attribute.Name: CATFTAChamferDefaultUpperTolSetting
st:attribute.st:role: Default upper tolerance value for chamfer size
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the default upper tolerance value for chamfer size.

st:attribute.Name: CATFTAChamferSymLowerTolSetting
st:attribute.st:role: Symmetric lower limit for chamfer size
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines whether the default lower tolerance value is symmetric in relation to the default upper tolerance value or not.

st:attribute.Name: CATFTAChamferDefaultLowerTolSetting
st:attribute.st:role: Default lower tolerance value for chamfer size
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the default lower tolerance value for angular size, enabled when Symmetric lower limit is not selected.

st:attribute.Name: CATFTAChamferNumValStepSetting
st:attribute.st:role: Numerical value increment for chamfer size
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the numerical value increment for chamfer size .

st:attribute.Name: CATFTAChamferGeneralTolClassSetting
st:attribute.st:role: General tolerance class for chamfer size ISO standard
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the general tolerance class for chamfer size, according to ISO Standard

st:attribute.Name: CATFTAChamferGeneralTolASMEClassSetting
st:attribute.st:role: General tolerance class for chamfer size ASME standard
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the general tolerance class for chamfer size, according to ASME Standard

st:attribute.Name: TPS_SIZE_DEFAULTUPPERNUM_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Default upper tolerance value for linear size
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the default upper tolerance value for linear size.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_SIZE_SYM_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Symmetric lower limit for linear size
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines whether the default lower tolerance value is symmetric in relation to the default upper tolerance value or not.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_SIZE_DEFAULTLOWERNUM_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Default lower tolerance value for linear size
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the default lower tolerance value for linear size, enabled when Symmetric lower limit is not selected.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_SIZE_DEFAULTNUMSTEP_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Numerical value increment for linear size
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the numerical increment value for linear size .

st:attribute.Name: TPS_SIZE_DEFAULTTAB_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Default tabulated value for linear size
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the default tabulated value for linear size.

st:attribute.Name: DIM_GENERAL_TOL_CLASS
st:attribute.st:role: General tolerance class for linear size ISO standard
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the general tolerance class for linear size, according to ISO Standard.

st:attribute.Name: DIM_GENERAL_TOL_ASME_CLASS
st:attribute.st:role: General tolerance class for linear size ASME standard
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the general tolerance class for linear size, according to ASME Standard.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_ANNOT_SEMANTICDEFAULTNUM_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Default numerical value for geometrical tolerance
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the default numerical for geometrical tolerance.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_ANNOT_SEMANTICSTEP_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Numerical value increment for geometrical tolerance
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the numerical value increment for geometrical tolerance.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_ANNOT_DEFAULTPRECISION_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Precision for geometrical tolerance
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the geometrical tolerance precision after the numerical separator.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_ANNOT_DEFAULTSEPARATOR_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Separator for geometrical tolerance
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the symbol used as separator.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_ANNOT_ZEROAFTER_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Display trailing zeros
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines whether the trailing zeros are displayed or not, according to the precision.

st:attribute.Name: TPS_ANNOT_ZEROBEFORE_SETTING
st:attribute.st:role: Display leading zeros
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines whether the "0" before the numerical separator, when value is less than 1, is displayed or not.

st:attribute.Name: ViewAssociativity
st:attribute.Tabpage: /Mechanical Design/Functional Tolerancing and Annotation/View Annotation Plane
st:attribute.st:role: Create views associative to geometry
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Associativity between views and geometry allows views and their 3D annotations to be automatically updated when the geometry is modified.

st:attribute.Name: ViewReferential
st:attribute.Tabpage: /Mechanical Design/Functional Tolerancing and Annotation/View Annotation Plane
st:attribute.st:role: View axis display
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Specifies whether the axis is displayed in the current view.

st:enum.st:detailedRole: All the axis systems are hidden.
st:enum.st:role: View axis systems displayed for current view only
st:enum.st:detailedRole: Only the axis system of the active view/annotation plane is displayed.
st:enum.st:role: View axis systems displayed for last selected view
st:enum.st:detailedRole: Only the axis system of the last selected view/annotation plane, in multi-selection context, is displayed.

st:attribute.Name: ViewReferentialZoomable
st:attribute.Tabpage: /Mechanical Design/Functional Tolerancing and Annotation/View Annotation Plane
st:attribute.st:role: View axis zoomable
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines whether the view axis is zoomable like geometry.

st:attribute.Name: ViewProfile
st:attribute.Tabpage: /Mechanical Design/Functional Tolerancing and Annotation/View Annotation Plane
st:attribute.st:role: Visualization of the profile in the current view
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines whether the profile of the sectioned or cut geometry is displayed in the current view.

st:attribute.Name: CATFTAAnnotOnZeroZSetting
st:attribute.Tabpage: /Mechanical Design/Functional Tolerancing and Annotation/View Annotation Plane
st:attribute.st:role: Dimension And Annotation Default Position Along View Normal
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Options for dimensions and annotations default position management at creation time.

st:Tabpage.RootTabpage: /Mechanical Design/Functional Tolerancing and Annotation/View Annotation Plane
